decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: Location Plan; 01 Rev 12/06/23 (Existing and Proposed Ground and First Floor Plans); 02 Rev 12/06/23 (Existing and Proposed Loft and Roof Plans); 03 Rev 12/06/23 (Proposed Loft Plan); 04 Rev 12/06/23 (Existing and Proposed Front and Rear Elevations); 05 Rev 12/06/23 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation); 06 Rev 12/06/23 (Existing and Proposed Section A-A).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The hereby approved three side elevational windows shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.

Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The hereby approved two rooflights to front roof slope shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host house and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4  of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Rear roof extension to main roof slope; rear roof extension to outrigger incorporating a Juliet balcony; installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
